report_detail.file_description: Expanding the data warehouse. MRL has relocated. Data Analysis Student Contest Guidelines Available

report_detail.file_title: Use of LTPP SMP Data to Quantify Moisture Impacts on Fatigue Cracking in Flexible Pavements
report_detail.file_description: This report shows moisture increase in pavement subsurface layers has an essential influence on granular material properties and affects expected pavement performance.

report_detail.file_title: Acceptance Testing of High-Speed Transverse Profile Measuring Systems Purchased for the Long-Term Pavement Performance Program
report_detail.file_description: This TechBrief shows the transverse profiles collected by all four AHSVs showed good repeatability and, when compared to reference profiles, good accuracy. It was demonstrated that the cross-correlation method could be used to evaluate the repeatability and the accuracy of data collected by transverse profile measuring system.

report_detail.file_title: Long-Term Pavement Performance Information Management System User Guide
report_detail.file_description: This document provides information to aid in understanding and using the Long-Term Pavement Performance(LTPP) program’s Pavement Performance Database (PPDB), LTPP Traffic Analysis Software (LTAS) database, and contents of the Ancillary Information Management System (AIMS) and LTPP InfoPave™.
This TechBrief discusses how FHWA collects a tremendous amount of valuable data through cutting-edge testing technology, sponsored research, and other collaborative efforts.

report_detail.file_title: Long-Term Pavement Performance Data Analysis Plan
report_detail.file_description: This TechBrief summarizes the planning, conduct, and outcomes of the Federal Highway Administration’s (FHWA’s) Long-Term Pavement Performance (LTPP) program Data Analysis Workshop.
Summer Newsletter discussions on Forensic Investigations

This brochure discusses how some of the features allows users to narrow their searches by selecting the type of asset (bridge, pavement, or tunnel), materials, structural element, and the target of the investigation.

report_detail.file_title: LTPP Manual for Collecting and Processing Longitudinal Profile, Macrotexture, and Transverse Profile Data
report_detail.file_description: This manual describes operational procedures for collecting longitudinal profile, macrotexture, and transverse profile data for the Long-Term Pavement Performance program using a High-Speed Survey Vehicle.
